title: How Dietrich Mateschitz's death set Christian Horner on road to Red Bull F1 exit
summary: Red Bull co-founder Dietrich Mateschitz's death didn't just change the company. It marked the begining of the end for Christian Horner's two-decade reign at the head of the F1 team

qa_pairs.question: Who was the co-founder of Red Bull Racing who recently passed away?
What role did Christian Horner hold at Red Bull Racing?
How long did Christian Horner lead Red Bull Racing before facing potential changes?
